group_1.narration: After I realized that I was in love with Teacher,@it was a very trying time...@I was trying to appeal to him every day...

group_1.textLeft: Teacher, would you like to chat?

group_1.textRight: We can take a break now.

group_1.textLeft: Umm, say, Teacher...
Are you perhaps seeing anyone...?

group_1.textRight: ...Why are you suddenly asking me about that?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I'm just interested in romance.

group_1.textRight: It'd be boring listening to mine.

group_1.textLeft: Th-that's not true...!@I'm quite interested in adult relationships.
So, then, I wonder if you're...s-seeing anyone...?

group_1.textRight: ...I'm not.

group_1.textLeft: .........[wait:1.0][chara:103501:eyeClose_1][chara:103501:cheek_1][chara:103501:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:103501:lipSynch_1]Aha...

group_1.textRight: I don't know what's so funny about that...

group_1.textLeft: I wasn't laughing at you.
So, what's your type?

group_1.textRight: My type... I don't really have one...

group_1.textLeft: That's not an answer, Teacher!@Don't you have any preferences?
L-like, for instance, a half-Russian girl,@or such...

group_1.textRight: ...The only people I've dated have been Japanese,@so...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
I-is that so...

group_1.textRight: Why are you so disappointed?

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry, you're right.
I owe you an apology for not telling you my type@as well...

group_1.textRight: No... I'm not really interested in that...

group_1.textLeft: However, I...don't really have a particular type@I prefer...
I suppose you could say that the one I@fall in love with is my type...

group_1.textRight: That's not really an answer, is it?

group_1.textLeft: I can tell you what I like about the person who@I like now.
He's older than me... He's an excellent singer...@He's good at math...
He's usually quite sullen and stern, but sometimes@he smiles at me ever so gently.
But when he has to scold me,@he scolds me quite seriously... *Giggle*

group_1.textRight: I see... He sounds like a jerk.

group_1.textLeft: Mmmmgh...

group_1.textRight: What...?

group_1.textLeft: I'm mad...

group_1.textRight: Ahhh, I see... My bad...
Of course you'd get mad if someone said@bad things about someone you like.
I was in the wrong.

group_1.textLeft: No, Teacher, that's not it.@I was describing you!

group_1.textRight: Don't mess around.@Get on with your practice.

group_1.textLeft: Yes... I'll continue practicing,@since you're being so scary...

group_1.narration: Teacher and I were teacher and student,@so the only way I could convey my feelings@was to joke about it like this.
—Alexandra—@I didn't have the courage to write my name, but...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Ah, Teacher! I've been waiting for you♪

group_1.textRight: What was that letter about...?

group_1.textLeft: Did you read it?

group_1.textRight: No, I haven't read it yet.
I wasn't sure who sent it,@but it must've been you.

group_1.textLeft: Wh-whaaat?@Wh-whatever could you mean...?

group_1.textRight: You just said, "Did you read it?"

group_1.textLeft: D-did I say such a thing?@I don't recall...!

group_1.textRight: ...Then I guess I can go ahead and burn it.

group_1.textLeft: Eeeeeek!@I'm sorry! It was me!
I wrote it with all my heart, so please@read it before you burn it!

group_1.textRight: Sheesh... I don't know what's so funny about@messing with me...

group_1.textLeft: Messing with...?

group_1.textRight: Aren't you?
You wanted to laugh at my embarrassment at@receiving an anonymous love letter...
...without me realizing that it was just a prank,@didn't you?
But the handwriting on the address is clearly yours.@That gave it all away.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...
(That's right...if I think about it from@his point of view...)
(I can't blame him if he thinks it's a trap.)
(It looks like I'm playing a prank on him...)
(But, he remembered my handwriting...)

group_1.textRight: I don't know why you're grinning so much@after a failed prank.

group_1.textLeft: (Okay, then I'll...!)

group_1.textRight: Hey, why'd you put the same letter in there again?
There's no chance I'll fall for it now, you know...?

group_1.textLeft: Ehehe...
(You don't have to tell me that, Teacher.)

group_1.narration: As usual,@he thought I was joking@and didn't get the message.@But I wasn't sad.
In fact,@every day was fun,@and I wished that our relationship@would go on forever.
